snippet: Three young white men who admitted they were out hunting black people to attack when they beat, ran over and killed a 47-year-old car plant worker in 2011 were sentenced Tuesday to federal prison after a hate crimes investigation.
abstract: Three young white men who admitted they were hunting black people to attack when they beat, ran over and killed black man James Craig Anderson in Mississippi in 2011 are sentenced to federal prison after hate crimes investigation.
lead_paragraph: Three young white men who admitted they were out hunting black people to attack when they beat, ran over and killed a 47-year-old car plant worker in 2011 were sentenced Tuesday to federal prison after a hate crimes investigation.

headline.main: Mississippi: 3 Sentenced to Prison in Racially Motivated Killing
headline.print_headline: Mississippi: 3 Sentenced to Prison in Racially Motivated Killing
